modName: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer 2 - Light and Dark
summary: Light and dark themes for Mod Organizer and Mod Organizer 2 that focus on a clean and modern design.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1VZl4HY.png[/img]
[font=Trebuchet MS][center][/center][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#008888][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[list=1][*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Download the themes of your choice manually. Paper is not a mod, so don't install it using Mod Organizer. [/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Unzip the archive (.7z) using 7-Zip.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Move [b]all of the files and folders[/b] from the archive to MO’s stylesheets folder. File path: <where you installed MO>\Mod Organizer\stylesheets[/*][/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#008888][b]Usage[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[list=1][*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Click the Settings button on the top toolbar. [/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Select the Paper theme you want on the Style dropdown menu. [/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Click the OK button to apply the theme. [/size][/font][/*]
[/list]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/1ax7bFp.png[/img]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#008888][b]Application Icon Pack for MO and MO 2[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[size=3][font=Trebuchet MS]Application Icon Pack for MO and MO 2 includes 6 application icons in teal, green, and orange for MO and MO 2 to help users using multiple installations of MO to differentiate between installations. A .svg template is also included for you to customize it to your heart’s content.
[/font][/size]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#008888][b]Usage[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[size=3][font=Trebuchet MS]Right click the MO icon and select [i]Properties[/i]. Click the [i]Change Icon…[/i] button, find the .ico files, apply them and you’re good to go.
[/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#008888][b]Consider checking out my other work[/b][/color][/font][/size]

[center][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18589][img]https://i.imgur.com/9hvsMv0.png[/img][/url] [url=https://tesloreillustrated.tumblr.com][img]https://i.imgur.com/wECGg8h.png[/img][/url] [url=https://6788-00.tumblr.com][img]https://i.imgur.com/CuOkzxz.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68479][img]https://i.imgur.com/FZm9tGn.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68054][img]https://i.imgur.com/V1rwbip.png[/img][/url][/center]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GgrbpSk.png[/img]

files.name: Paper Complete Collection
files.changelogHtml:
- Redesigned rows on left and right pane when moused over.
- Group boxes are now styled.
- Headers rows now have separators for easier resizing of columns.
- Ascending/descending indicator on header rows is now placed properly.
- Fixed the styling of the corner where vertical and horizontal scroll bars meet.
- Fixed an issue where text on header rows was clipped.
- Fixed an issue where text on tabs shifted when its tab was selected.
- Changed the shade of green and blue on Paper Light and Paper Dark

files.name: Paper Light and Dark
files.changelogHtml:
- Completely overhauled the look of Paper.
- Discontinued Green and Orange Editions (They can be recreated easily. See: the Customizing Paper article).

files.name: Application Icon Pack for Mod Organizer
Paper Themes for Mod Organizer 2 - Light and Dark
files.fileName: Paper Light and Dark Themes for Mod Organizer-64439-3-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
2018-03-04

- Redesigned tooltips, context, and dropdown menus.
- Added icons for checkboxes and arrows.
- Increased font size to 12 px.
- Lightened the background color of Paper Dark to increase contrast and clarity.
- Added comments to describe all of the selectors.
- Added color palette to make keeping track of colors easier.
- Minor cleanup.

files.name: Application Icon Pack for Mod Organizer 2
files.fileName: Application Icon Pack for Mod Organizer and Mod Organizer 2-64439-IP-1-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
2018-03-13

- Added icons for Mod Organizer 2.
- Updated the template file.

files.name: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark
files.fileName: Paper Light and Dark Themes for Mod Organizer and Mod Organizer 2-64439-3-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
- Completely overhauled the look of Paper.
- Discontinued Green and Orange Editions (They can be recreated easily. See: the Customizing Paper article).

files.name: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark
files.fileName: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer 2 - Light and Dark-64439-3-2.7z
files.changelogHtml:
2018-05-20

- Removed the background of the toolbar buttons.
- Added a border around disabled buttons.
- Added a border around disabled tabs.
- Added a border around text fields when selected.
- Increased the top-bottom margin of dropdown menus from 2 pixels to 4 pixels.
- Corrected the text color on the Modify Executables window.
- Corrected the top left and bottom right corners of the progress bar not being rounded.
- Changed how tabs are styled when moused-over and selected.
- Styled spinboxes (usually for changing numbers).
- Styled Sliders.
- Minor cleanup.

files.name: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark
files.fileName: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark-64439-3-0-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
2018-08-07

- Styled the Downloads tab.
- Corrected the text color on the Modify Executables window on Paper Dark.
- Removed the background of the toolbar buttons.
- Changed the styling of the tabs when moused-over and selected.
- Corrected the top left and bottom right corners of the progress bar not being rounded.

files.name: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark
files.fileName: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark-64439-4-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
2018-08-11

- Added various icons for buttons.
- Styled the Downloads tab.
- Replaced all of the icons with vector files (.svg).
- Changed the styling of the tabs when moused-over and selected
- Made the styling of the Change Categories and Primary Category buttons on the right click menu more consistent with the rest of the entries.
- Matched the size of buttons and dropdown menus.
- Increased the width of the Filter button.
- Increased the width of the Categories panel.
- Various size fixes for the Categories panel.
- Styled the LCD number on the Conflicts tab.
- Highlighted the Run button.

files.name: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark
files.fileName: Paper Themes for Mod Organizer - Light and Dark-64439-4-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
2018-08-15

- Replaced the Restore button.
- Removed the highlighted border when a text field is selected.
- Darkened the background color of Paper Light slightly to increase contrast and clarity.
- Corrected the color of the checkmarks on Paper Dark.
- Adjusted the size of the Open Folders button.
- Fixed some titles of group boxes clipping the group box border.
- Minor cleanup.

files.name: Paper Automata
files.changelogHtml:
2018-09-01

- Styled checkboxes when moused-over.
- Styled the indicators for open and closed branches.
- Styled the checkboxes using QSS instead of images.
